name: ReadAllRegUserInfo
body: SELECT given_name, middle_name, family_name, email  FROM Reg_User

name: ReadThisRegUserInfo
body:
SELECT given_name, middle_name, family_name, email  FROM Reg_User
  WHERE Reg_User_id = preg_user_id

name: ReadRegUserInfoThisEmail
body:
SELECT given_name, middle_name, family_name FROM Reg_User
  WHERE email = pemail
